title: pankajadhala nayanE
sahitya:
pankajadala nayanE trinayanE sham kuru shAmbhavi mangala sadanE

anupallavi

 shankaradayitE shailEsha sutE shAnka mukhAlaya vartana niratE

caraNam

 svAmini mAyini tribhuvana pAlini sAkSAtkAra vidhAyini janani 
kAmita dAyini karuNA shAlini kAtyAyani vana tulasI mAlini
